title: [DOCS] Fix version inconsistencies and branding confusion
body:
## Problem
- Different versions across files (1.0.0, 3.0.0, 1.1.0)
- Mixed branding between 'nscale DMS Assistent' and 'Digitale Akte Assistent'

## Tasks
- [ ] Standardize version to 3.0.0
- [ ] Update all references to new branding
- [ ] Fix broken internal links
- [ ] Update installation guides
- [ ] Generate API documentation

## Acceptance Criteria
- Consistent versioning
- Consistent branding
- All links work
- API fully documented

## Priority: HIGH
## Effort: 5 story points
